summary: Fix memory leak in data processing pipeline
description:
The data processing pipeline is experiencing memory leaks that cause the application to crash after processing large datasets.

Acceptance Criteria:
1. Memory usage should remain stable during processing of large datasets (>10GB)
2. The application should not crash after processing multiple batches
3. Memory should be properly released after each batch is processed
acceptanceCriteria: Memory usage should remain stable during processing of large datasets (>10GB)
The application should not crash after processing multiple batches
Memory should be properly released after each batch is processed
